extendedInfo.description: Block unwanted calls and spam texts with NUMBERCOPÂ® Phone Spam Blockerâ¢. Our award-winning call and text blocker, blocks more than 50.000 spamming phone numbers: phone scams, phishing calls, telemarketers and mass SMS spam senders. Works like Antivirus security - blocks known spam numbers automatically with daily spam protection updates, free for one month. Easily personalize your blacklist and whitelist, lookup suspicious #'s and report new spam numbers. Protect your privacy, avoid identity theft and save minutes with NUMBERCOP.FEATURES:â¶ Automated Spam DetectionNUMBERCOP blocks spam calls and text messages automatically. It is powered by NUMBERCOP's Phone Spam Index which tracks thousands of spamming phone numbers for the area where you live.â¶ Simple Spam ReportingSimilar to spam filtering for emails NUMBERCOP uses a combination of in-house spam research and user reports for phone spam filtering. With NUMBERCOP you can join us fighting phone spam and report new spam easily and anonymously.â¶ Personalize Your BlockingNUMBERCOP specializes in detecting soliciting and fraudulent numbers, such as phone scams, billing fraud schemes, phishing calls and robocalls. You can customize and enhance this protection by adding personal numbers or by unblocking selected numbers. â¶ Lookup Suspicious Numbers Unauthorized phone spammers change their caller-id number on average every 2 weeks to prevent legal prosecution. With NUMBERCOP you can find relevant information about a new caller ID before you pick up a call or reply to a text message.â¶ Scan Text MessagesSMS/text message spam can be expensive if you pay for incoming text messages or if you accidently opt-in to a premium service. NUMBERCOP allows you to scan your text messages for known scams and risky links.â¶ No Risk TrialNUMBERCOP starts out as a 30-day trial. No email sign up or credit card required. After free 30-days you can purchase NUMBERCOP for $4.99 USD. And in case you ever change your device: We can switch your subscription to your new device.Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/numbercopFollow us on Twitter  http://www.twitter.com/numbercopFollow us on Google+ http://gplus.to/numbercopLearn more about NUMBERCOPhttp://www.numbercop.com or service@numbercop.comLanguages: English, EspaÃ±ol, PortuguÃªs, FranÃ§ais, Deutsch, Italiano, TÃ¼rkÃ§e, PÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, Bahasa Indonesia, íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, ç®ä½ä¸­æ, ç¹é«ä¸­æ

reviews.title: All Short Codes Blocked
reviews.comment: Seems all short codes are blocked. At least the first message comes through so you have an option to unblock the number, but it\'s becoming a pain since services such as Facebook and Yahoo use groups of numbers, meaning every time a new thread/conversation is started, Numbercop notifies you of a new blocked number. Since all short codes are required to support the \"stop\" command, all short codes should be exempt from Numbercop.
reviews.author: Fox Sterling

reviews.title: Not free
reviews.comment: 30 day trial.  Tricky advertising.  Not cool!
reviews.author: Alon Hillel-Tuch

reviews.comment: Great number and text blocker.
reviews.author: Clay Watkins

reviews.title: A Happy Google User!
reviews.comment: Love it !!   :-))
reviews.author: Karen O\'Campo

reviews.comment: Blocks all of the spam calls that get past the do not call listing.
reviews.author: Greg Knipp

reviews.comment: Not block everything
reviews.author: merlyn cifuentes

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app has saved my sanity was getting bombarded by unwanted calls.  Now I know they call but no longer have to answer or take any notice.  If your having a problem with unwanted calls don\'t hesitate install this app.
reviews.author: Andrew Austin

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: My husband keeps calling and it disconects us and says its spam. I\'m sick right now and he needs to know how I am and it won\'t let me get any type of phone calls that\'s are not in my contact list. I\'m trying to wait for a spacific phone call and I can\'t get it because it doesn\'t have a number in my contacts. If I knew the many different numbers the company calls from then I would put every single number down. this app should have the option to block numbers you don\'t want blocked like in spacific not all
reviews.author: Tanya Grant

reviews.title: Free?
reviews.comment: Hate when they do that, mark it as \"free\" and after you install there\'s a fine print \"free trial for 30 days\" and after you pay if you want to keep it! Maybe, this app is sponsored by spammers to milk you again?
reviews.author: Shakir Mamedov

reviews.title: Great for blocking spam text messages
reviews.comment: This is the best app that I have found for blocking text messages that are unwanted
reviews.author: Debbie Giaquinto

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I would give it 5 stars if I could set it silent for blocked calls. It rings once. If I wanted to hear ring from blocked I wouldn\'t block them.
reviews.author: David Faigle

reviews.title: Just plain works!
reviews.comment: This app has already saved me from many unwanted conversations. Works better than my email spam filter!
reviews.author: Katie Byer

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: I love this app. I get a lot of unknown phone calls and message\'s.   With this app problem solve
reviews.author: Zena Heard

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Just love it
reviews.author: Kar Na

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fab app
reviews.author: MaXine Lewis

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good
reviews.author: Katalina Dickens

reviews.title: Good and helpful app.
reviews.comment: I don\'t recieve bad call amd my mobile is safe. Thanks to your app.
reviews.author: Arnold Singh

reviews.title: It works...sometimes.
reviews.comment: It blocks regular friends and family even after you manually unblock them. Something i should not have to be doing! It only works if your internet connection is active.. so much for protection!   But it does a good job at blocking friends and family! I will only do one more update, if it doesn\'t get better im uninstalling.
reviews.author: miguel ochoa

reviews.comment: I love it so far!!!
reviews.author: Sylvia Gonzalez

reviews.comment: Scrumptious
